availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fredrick C. Smith (Frankfort, Kentucky, fabricated steel producer and tinner.)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, fabricated steel producer and tinner. New York native. Married to Crisa Jane Strickler in Hardin County on June 5, 1849. Father of Edna A. Smith. Fabricated steel producer in Hardin County in 1850. Tinner in Frankfort in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, Northern District, p. 307A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 390.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hardin County Marriages.
"Fredrick C. Smith (9 Jul 1827-24 May 1868)," Find A Grave, Memorial 72011944, accessed January 17, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/72011944.
